name: starfish and roses
description: Based on the tutorial at http://krazydad.com/tutorials/circles_js/. A code error resulted in the 'galaxy swarm' sketch.

name: â˜† galactic swarm
description: Actually a broken version of 'starfish and roses', but I like it better.

name: sierpinski chaos game
description: A processing implementation of the chaos-game algorithm to generate a Sierpinski triangle, as found at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sierpinski_triangle

name: general case chaos game
description: The Sierpinski triangle chaos game algorithm generalized to other shapes by adding additional vertices
